title.narrative: Strengthening the extension department and cementing the market share of Royal fresh

description.narrative:
Mukurwe-ini wakulima dairy limited is at a very importantant stage of their development now with regards to 'Royal fresh'. In 2017, the focus was still on mobilising members' milk to work towards full utilisation of the processing facility, efficient processing operations, strenthening of governnace and management and growing the market share of the brand-'Royal fresh'. During the same year, the company grew tremendously, processing upto a high of 41K litres of milk per day and making revenues of upto KES 1 billion. This is expected to grow to a daily average of 45K litres being processed in 2018. The milk processed in 2017 came came from an active membership of 6980 farmers within the catchment area of MWDL who were paid a farm gate price of KES 35 per litre on average throughout the year, which was a historical high. In 2018, MWDL intent to invest on a UHT line thus opening up possibilities to target new markets that cannot be served by fresh milk owing to distance and adverse whether conditions. The focus therefore during the year will be to continue pushing the farmers to produce more milk for efficient utilisation of the processing capacity and to also work hard on the marketing front to open the new markets as well as cement the existing ones.
Project Activities: Train the extension staff in a practical dairy training farm: • Extension methodology • Breeding inc. calf rearing • Nutrition et al Exchange visit of the extension team to a dairy processing cooperative or company Develop effective training materials tailored to MWDL's farmers Work towards implementation of food safety management system (HACCP) Board and management workshop on responsibilities of the board and current board practices, conflict of interest and Strategic direction as well as KPIs
Increased milk deliveries from the farmers up to a daily average of 45000L in 2018 Continuous pay of competitive farm gate prices. Strong governance structures devoid of corruption and conflict of interest. Improved quality decision making within the board.
Admin cost. The value is summarized by year
Advise days. The value is summarized by year
Disbursement to Mukurwe-ini Wakulima Dairy Ltd
Incoming commitment from Directoraat Generaal Internationale Samenwerking
Incoming commitment from Mukurwe-ini Wakulima Dairy Company
